win_condition: 0) You win when all players that aren’t part of the werewolf team have been killed.

abilities.basics: *Passive:* Private vote counts as +2
*Passive:* Start with 2 votes on public polls
*Passive:* Public vote count as -1
abilities.details: If the %n becomes Mayor; their vote is counted as -2.

abilities.basics: *Passive:* Start with -2 votes on public polls
*Passive:* Private vote counts as -5
*Passive:* Can not change alignment by any means.
abilities.details: Any attempts to do so will fail.

abilities.basics: *Passive:* Join wolfpack if a member of the wolfpack dies
*Immediate Day:* Disguise two players
abilities.details: All players lose their disguise at the end of the night.

abilities.basics: *Immediate Day:* Select a diguise for yourself. (Strong Disguise)
abilities.details: Wolfpack is informed at the start of the night about the name of your disguise, with no elaboration.

abilities.basics: *Immediate Day:* Learn a players role.
abilities.details: Wolfpack is informed at the start of the night about the name of your result, with no elaboration. The %n will see the SoloWWW’s as a random werewolf role.

abilities.basics: *Immediate Day:* Learn a players role. (once)
abilities.details: The %n will see the SoloWWW’s as a random werewolf role.

abilities.basics: *Immediate Day:* Disguise one player
abilities.details: All players lose their disguise at the end of the night.

abilities.basics: *Immediate Day:* Disguise three players
abilities.details: All players lose their disguise at the end of the night.

abilities.basics: *Passive:* Immediately notified of all powers used on them. When a Wolf-Aligned player uses a power on them, they are given that player's name.
abilities.details: The %n is told what power was used on them, but not the identity of the player that used a power on them.

abilities.basics: *Immediate Night:* Check one players role
abilities.details: The %n will see the SoloWWW’s as a random werewolf role.

abilities.basics: *Immediate Night:* Check one players role (once).
abilities.details: The %n will see the SoloWWW’s as a random werewolf role.

abilities.basics: *Passive:* Join wolfpack if a member of the wolfpack dies and gain immunity for the next/current night if it happens
*Passive:* If you are the only player in the wolf pack, there will be two kill polls.
abilities.details: Direwolf.

abilities.basics: *Night 1:* Choose a disguise, will be permanently disguised as that role for the rest of the game.
*Night 1:* Learns the name of a random role present in the game.
*Night 1:* Learns the name of two random roles present in the game.
*Night 1:* Learns the name of all the roles present in the game.
*Night 1:* Convert a player into a random wolf role
abilities.details: Members of the wolfpack can’t be infected.

abilities.basics: *Immediate Night:* Saboteur Wolf
*Immediate Night:* Corrupt Wolf
*Immediate Night:* Psychic Wolf for one player
abilities.details: SoloWWW’s will appear as a random werewolf role to this power; regardless of what they are checked as. You may guess abilities (like Runner), partial roles (like Lone or Firebird) or full roles (like Lone Firebird).

abilities.basics: *Immediate Night:* Psychic Wolf for two players
abilities.details: SoloWWW’s will appear as a random werewolf role to this power; regardless of what they are checked as. You may guess abilities (like Runner), partial roles (like Lone or Firebird) or full roles (like Lone Firebird).

abilities.basics: *Immediate Night:* Psychic Wolf for three players
abilities.details: SoloWWW’swill appear as a random werewolf role to this power; regardless of what they are checked as. You may guess abilities (like Runner), partial roles (like Lone or Firebird) or full roles (like Lone Firebird).

abilities.basics: *End Night:** Attack a player
abilities.details: If they kill someone who isn’t on the Townsfolk team; the %n dies.

abilities.basics: *End Night:* May override the results of the wolfpack kill. (once)
*End Night:* May override the results of the wolfpack kill. (infinite use)
*On Attack:* Survive first night attack
*On Attack:* Survive first two night attacks
*On Attack:* Survive first night attack and kill attacker
*On Lynch:* Survive, reveal and cancel next lynch.
Should a wolf-aligned player attempt to attack the %n, the attack fails.
*On Death:* Attacker is revealed in wolfpack channel
abilities.details: If a group killed the %n; a random person of the group is selected. Does not work for lynch.

abilities.basics: *On Death:* Wolf’s Cub
*On Death:* Wolf’s Cub, but +2 kills
*On Death:* Wolf’s Cub, two nights in a row.
*Passive:* Bloody Butcher
*Passive:* Hellhound
abilities.details: All the Hellhounds have a secret channel where they can communicate with the other Hellhounds securely.

abilities.basics: *Passive:* Hellhound & Bloody Butcher
abilities.details: All the Hellhounds have a secret channel where they can communicate with the other Hellhounds securely.

abilities.basics: *Passive:* Bloody Butcher but for Bakers
*Passive:* Bloody Butcher but for Jury
*Passive:* Bloody Butcher but for Cult
*Passive:* Bloody Butcher for Bakers and Butchers
*Passive:* Start with 4 votes on public polls
abilities.win: You additionally also win if you do not gain any elected roles, and do not die at night. Elected roles you gain while being lynched count.
You additionally also win if the player above you in the list wins. If their win condition requires them to kill you; their team can still win even if you are alive.
You additionally also win if the player below you in the list wins. If their win condition requires them to kill you; their team can still win even if you are alive.
You additionally also win if three players visit you in a night.
